Actions.Name: Dancing Flames
Actions.Description: The Ifrit deals 2 damage to a character in range 3 and inflicts burning, then deals 2 damage to all burning characters.

Actions.Name: Ignition
Actions.Description: The Ifrit marks a foe in range 3.
Actions.Mark: While makred, that foe is burning, and at the start of that foe's turn, or when the Jotunn hits the target with an attack, they explode for a blast 1 area effect, dealing [fray] damage to all characters within.
